Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine

Class Updater

java.lang.Object
com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.Updater
All Implemented Interfaces:
Clearable, Updatable
public class Updater
extends java.lang.Object
implements Updatable, Clearable
An Updater contains a List of Updatable to which the update method will be delegated.

  • Constructor Details

    • Updater

      public Updater()

  • Method Details

    • addUpdatable

      public void addUpdatable​(Updatable updatable)
      Add an Updatable to this Updater. The Updatable will be added to a List, which will be iterated on each update.
      Parameters:
      updatable - the Updatable to be added

    • addUpdatable

      public void addUpdatable​(Updatable updatable, boolean asFirst)
      Add an Updatable to this Updater. The Updatable will be added to a List, which will be iterated on each update.
      Parameters:
      updatable - the Updatable to be added
      asFirst - Add an Updatable to this Updater as the first element and thus be execute first during an update

    • update

      public void update​(long timestamp)
      Description copied from interface: Updatable
      The update() method is called each frame.

      Use this method to init frame-based behaviour to the game-object.

      Specified by:
      update in interface Updatable
      Parameters:
      timestamp - The timestamp of this update.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Description copied from interface: Clearable
      Implement this method and use it to clear the content of this Object.
      Specified by:
      clear in interface Clearable
